title: Mona Farnisa
text: I am a passionate early career data enthusiast on a journey of exploration and discovery within the vast realm of data science. As I navigate this fascinating landscape, my dedication lies in honing my data analysis skills - from delving into statistical models to crafting compelling visualizations and learning new coding platforms, every step is a venture into the ever-evolving world of data science. What drives me is the genuine excitement about the endless possibilities that working with data can offer. I invite you to learn more about me on this growing website and join me as I work on some hobby coding projects here :)

title: ~ experience
text:
~ experience
I am a Data Analyst for the Western Wilfire Resilience Index at the National Center for Ecological Analysis and Synthesis. This is a new project and I am excited to be a part of the initial team tasked with launching this



~ education
MS in Natural Resources & Environmental Science | May 2020 - December 2022 | University of Nevada, Reno | Reno, NV
BS in Environmental Science | August 2014 - June 2017 | Amsterdam University College | Amsterdam, The Netherlands
Semester Abroad | June - December 2016 | University of Queensland | Brisbane, Australia
